data.text: @bloodysamoan Yay that's good, I'm glad you're nearly recovered

@krogermagi My iso ended on 1 March not 29 Feb 😉

But I took a RAT test on 2 March which was negative
@krogermagi The website and a doctor friend said iso starts from either symptoms starting or test results

@_Ch3113_ It's all good. Glad I tested and did iso as soon as I felt the itchy throat.

I'm about 90% recovered now. Feeling pretty normal and my case of COVID was fairly similar to a normal cold, so I was fortunate
@bloodysamoan Really sorry it took this long for you to get a result. How're you feeling today? Well I hope
@bloodysamoan omfg. Glad you're recovering ok tho!

UPDATE: Day 12 and my + PCR test result is finally showing on the website (still no text yet)

12 days for the result & 10 days for self-iso 🤷🏾‍♂️ https://t.co/6n6cWMktUu
@bloodysamoan Sole that happened to me too lol some peeps don’t even get their PCR results till the end 😂🤦🏽‍♂️
